name: Real Combat Action
description:
You are equipped with strong guns. Enemy forces are on the way of attacking on your army's headquarters. So you must destroy their continuing attacks in order to defend your headquarters.

Features:
- Realistic FPS (First Person Shooter) scenario
- Realistic enemy forces with helicopters and tanks
- Efficient weapon controls & movement
- Excellent environment
- Fabulous sound effects
- Easy GUI and controls
- First person shooting
- Real Military Convoy
